name: Xataface
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Xataface is a full-featured Web application framework. It automatically generates the appropriate forms, lists, and menus for a user to interact with a MySQL database without having to know any SQL.

matches.text: <!-- custom javascripts can go in slot "custom_javascripts" -->
<!-- Place any other items in the head of the document by filling the "head_slot" slot -->

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div class="fineprint">[\s]+Powered by Xataface<br\/>[\s]+\(c\) 2005-(20[\d]{2}) All rights reserved<\/div>)
